package com.util;

import org.junit.rules.Timeout;
import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebElement;
import org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.Select;

import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;



public class Test2 {

	static WebDriver driver=null;
	public static void main(String[] args) throws InterruptedException {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		driver=new FirefoxDriver();
		driver.manage().timeouts().implicitlyWait(30, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
		driver.get("http://www.apsrtconline.in/oprs-web/");
		driver.manage().window().maximize();
		
		
		driver.findElement(By.name("fromPlaceName")).sendKeys("KURNOOL");
		driver.findElement(By.id("ui-id-47")).click();
				
		driver.findElement(By.name("toPlaceName")).sendKeys("HYDERABAD");
		driver.findElement(By.id("ui-id-37")).click();
		
		driver.findElement(By.name("txtJourneyDate")).click();
		driver.findElement(By.id("//*[@id='ui-datepicker-div']/div[1]/table/tbody/tr[4]/td[3]/a"));
		
		driver.findElement(By.id("searchBtn")).click();
		
		Thread.sleep(5000);
		WebElement d1=driver.findElement(By.id("noRecordsFound"));
		if(d1.isDisplayed())
		 {
			 System.out.println("no results found for the search");
		 }
		else
		{
			driver.findElement(By.name("SrvcSelectBtnForward")).click();
			WebElement d2=driver.findElement(By.id("ForwardBoardId"));
		    Select se=new Select(d2);
		    se.selectByValue("7921");
		    
		    WebElement d3=driver.findElement(By.id("ForwardDroppingId"));
		    Select se1=new Select(d3);
		    se1.selectByValue("5251");
		    
		    WebElement d4=driver.findElement(By.id("concessionId"));
		    Select se2=new Select(d4);
		    se2.selectByVisibleText("GENERAL PUBLIC");

            driver.findElement(By.id("fwLtBtn"));
		    
		    
		}
		
		
	
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
	}

}
